thread.section_title: Trade Tested Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trade Tested | www.tradetested.co.nz
thread.title: Ross

author: Ross
title: Ross
text: Fantastic product as it was the best looking one we could find because we didn't want ugly- like most out there and feels like excellent quality. usually these items are expensive but like all trade tested products a very competitive. We are a busy construction company in Rotorua who have brought many items from these guys. Always impressed. Packaged well. Sent promptly, great service and they ask for feedback which indicates to us an awesome company. Regards Ross and Joleene at Face Lift
